vsParam: I see... You child got separated from you?

Yes. I was so careless...
Gee, I hope he's safe...

Calm down. Tell me where you lost your child?
And tell me his characteristics.

Will you help me look for my child?
But, this place is packed with monsters, it's very dangerous...

Never mind. I must find back your child
for the sake of Schwarzlang family's name.
Oh, Mimi! What are you doing?
Yah! You, don't jump out all of a sudden!

A child got separated from his mother.
I am going to find that child.

Finding a lost child...
Is this also an adventurer's job?

Yeah, it is. I'd be able to raise my family's reputation
if I complete these commissions splendidly.
So, I am still doing it for myself.

Although you say that,
you are worrying about that missing child, right?
N, no, I am not! I am doing this for myself!
Ah, ah ha ha. I see...

I can't bear you...
I gotta go.
Can you cope with it by yourself?
We must find that child as quickly as possible!

Uh, who do you think you are talking to?
Of course I can manage it.

That's right...
He may be in danger.

But, the child has gone missing,
we can only roughly guess his whereabouts, right?

I think it's better if we split and find him!
We'll help!

I can manage it by myself...
But if you insist, I guess it's harmless...

But, don't interfere with me.
Do you understand?

Alright~
Let's go find the child, [px]!

Wah ahhhh! I am so scared!
Who can save me!

Oh my god!
That child is attacked by a monster!
It must be the child we are looking for!

Hold on!
I'll take care of the monster!

Ah, fortunately, you are okay!
Thank you so much!

You are welcome. As a member of the Schwarzlang family,
I just did what I should.

Y, you are welcome!
Be careful in the future, don't wander away from your mom.

Tell me, what does helping others have
anything to do with aristocracy?

You said you want to raise your family's reputation,
I thought you'd only do earth-shaking things!

C, can't aristocrats help others?
They were in trouble!

The most important thing of being an aristocrat
is to bring no shame to the family!
I am kind of busy, I gotta go!

Er... She said that she wants to raise her family's reputation at
the start, and now she said she can't bring shame to her family?

Which is it?
It's too complicated, I am confused.

Ha-ha, I think she just said that to cover up her shyness?
And, although she acts strong... I think she's a good girl.

I couldn't say things like "I can't bring shame to my family"
like her, even if that's for covering up my shyness.

Ho ho, me either. But, no matter what the reason is,
it's really amazing of her to help others.
